body_html:
Yes, you could do this using a Saver, but it should be slightly faster (fewer copies etc.) to go through the feed mechanism. Either way, creating the saver or the placeholders once would be the way to go.

It looks like the thread-safety fix missed 0.9, but it should be in the nightlies and 0.10rc0.
body_text:
Yes, you could do this using a Saver, but it should be slightly faster (fewer copies etc.) to go through the feed mechanism. Either way, creating the saver or the placeholders once would be the way to go.
It looks like the thread-safety fix missed 0.9, but it should be in the nightlies and 0.10rc0.
body:
Yes, you could do this using a `Saver`, but it should be slightly faster (fewer copies etc.) to go through the feed mechanism. Either way, creating the saver or the placeholders once would be the way to go.

It looks like the thread-safety fix missed 0.9, but it should be in the nightlies and 0.10rc0.
